segments.text: I'm taking in the whole kitchen scene now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a tableau of domestic hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, making a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't noticed the water on her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are the children, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that looks like it will tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The idea of him falling into that water puddle is quite concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a combination of small, unfolding disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious everyone is to the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage will certainly be an issue from that overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a perfect storm of minor incidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR
